TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {62658=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 15268=Dorm life is not too great. They are small and old. Plus it is an all girls school with immature visitation rules. The visitation rules are that all visitors must be signed out by 12:30 am. I feel like i have more freedom at my own home than at the college. Also, the girls are full of drama.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Marie from Orange, NJ 11/05/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 15 Categories Comments Campus Safety It's security driving around nonstop even through hurricane sandy. i was scared for them. Greek Life None! I wish there was Clubs and Activities It's a lot. you have to join as much as possible if you can manage it all. Great for these types of students Stay focus and all about their work because on campus its not much to do.....if you don't go out there and look for something or join clubs. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus There's a graveyard right there!!!! creepy. Also there's only two dorms. Bang for the buck
